title: Make mastery 8 and 9
body:
Mastery 8 = 500k points
Mastery 9 = 1M points

Thats a true mastery.

not some washed up scrub can get them, they have to work for them

replies.body: It'd be weird to go from having skill (ish) requirements in the form of S grades, back to just time based grinding requirements.
its for people that actually play the champion. its not for everyone.
You can be garbage on a champ, spam it nonstop and get that.

i don't mind mastery level 8 and 9 but i think the requirement should be more in line with the level 6 and 7 and be like Get 4 S+ and then Get X% winrate in ranked over X amount of games respectively.
But what rewards do you get for reaching those mastery levels?
ok, but you only get to have 1 champ with lvl 9, choose wisely. no changing afterwards
